document_data.mainbody:
Hawksroost was a village found in the Moonsea North region of North Faer√ªn, circa the late 13 century DR.
The village lay  on the border of Thar southeast of the Ride, less than  south of Ilinvur. Before it was left to ruin, it was fairly accessible by the nearby Ilinvur Trail and Naed Creek.
Sometime after the , Hawksroost was destroyed in a series of ogre attacks.
Hawksroost was once the home of Daern, a warrior who fought alongside the Ilmatari priest Flaergon of Glister and figured highly in the tale of the Tome of Torment.
